本帖最后由 oliver 于 2012-7-11 13:06 编辑

Rules of The Survival Games:             饥饿游戏规则
Only one player can win The Survival Games.     只能有一个玩家赢饥饿游戏。You can not break any blocks, expect for leaves, vines and mushrooms. 你不能毁方块，除了树叶，藤蔓和蘑菇。You are only allowed to place blocks you find in chests. 你只能放方块在箱子里 找到的方块 。Your inventory must be empty before you start the game. 你不能有任何东西在游戏开始前。No player is allowed to enter the host house. 不能有任何人进入主机房。
外国网盘下载地址：http://www.mediafire.com/?fa8obken42kadfi
